name: Alpha Zoo
description:
Build and Explore


Explore a new zoo on every play-through. The game is gentle, but compelling, helping young players to learn how to explore digital spaces.

Learn Words


Alpha Zoo has 100 words to learn through typing. Children interact through the keyboard, and learn to spell and type words while playing.

Enjoy a Rich World


Alpha Zoo has lots of surprises. Players delight as they discover they can make animals poop, re-color the train and ferris wheel, eat food in the cafe, or buy clothes and stuffed animals in the gift shop.
